title: Bug 6304 - Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When I select a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file) in the package viewer and open the context menu, the 'Team' entry is not present.
EB: When I select a .java file and another resource in the package viewer and open the context menu, the 'Team' entry should be visible.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the package viewer. 2. Select a .java file and another resource (such as a .properties file). 3. Open the context menu and observe that the 'Team' entry is not present.
